Holding congresses of the World Azerbaijanis in Azerbaijan has become a good tradition. #Azerbaijan
The basis of this tradition was laid in 2001 by national leader Heydar Aliyev. #Azerbaijan
It was declared by the initiative of Nakhchivan in 1991 as December 31 as the World Azerbaijanis Solidarity Day. #Azerbaijan
Taking the opportunity I would like to share my thoughts on the activity of Azerbaijani diaspora organizations. #Azerbaijan
During the first congress, that is, during the last 10 years, great work has been done, the number of organizations has increased. #Azerbaijan
Five years ago, we had 336 diaspora organizations, and now their number has reached 416. #Azerbaijan
But at the same time, the quantity does not play a decisive role in this issue. #Azerbaijan
I think that our diaspora organizations should unite the whole Azerbaijani community in the countries where they operate. #Azerbaijan
Ideal variant may be that every Azerbaijani member is a member of diaspora organizations, (cont) http://tl.gd/bilbe1
I think that one of the most important factors is the unity of diaspora organizations. #Azerbaijan
There are, however, some contradictions, certain problems, and misunderstandings. #Azerbaijan
I would like to ask you to stop it if such a situation occurs. #Azerbaijan
Because we have to be together inside and outside the country. The union strengthens us. Unless we are united, we can not be strong. This is an axiom.
Cooperation between embassies and diaspora organizations should be even stronger and more purposeful. #Azerbaijan

We must try to tell about the reality of Azerbaijan to the whole world. The Armenian lobby operates against us. # Azerbaijan
He is fighting against us. Some politicians who are within their influence, some of the press (cont) http://tl.gd/bj53l5
The Azerbaijani state will protect and protect itself. #Azerbaijan
I am very pleased that our diaspora organizations have not only responded to the Armenian lobby organizations (cont) http://tl.gd/bj5a86
Our diplomacy should not be defensive, self-defensive. Our attack diplomacy results. #Azerbaijan
We must promote the truth of Azerbaijan and present the realities of Azerbaijan (cont) http://tl.gd/bj5hgq
At the same time, I think - in some cases we already see it - activity abroad (cont) http://tl.gd/bj5kra
We have begun to establish Azerbaijani culture houses abroad. This is a new initiative. (cont) http://tl.gd/bj5ses
We have a large family living abroad, it is Azerbaijanis. #Azerbaijan

Hello to everyone. After many years I returned last night from my official visit to our neighbor Bulgaria.
There are kinship ties with neighboring Bulgaria, there are cultural ties; so this trip was also important for me.
I would like to share with you some of my memories that I think you will be interested in leaving aside the official contacts of the trip.
The clergy are of great importance for the Muslim Turkish minority, whose numbers are close to 1.5 million,
With the muftis and imams in Shumen ... http://twitpic.com/5plmxd
This is my 1st year twitter anniversary. I am so grateful to all my twitter friends for bringing more insight and understanding to my world.
The area known as Deliorman in northern Bulgaria is one of the places where the Muslim Turkish minority lives most intensely.
Deliorman is also a region famous for wrestlers. Koca Yusuf was one of the most famous wrestlers ever to come.
The reputation of Koca Yusuf, known as 'Cihan Pehlivanı', extended to Europe before Kırkpınar and then to America.
Big Yusuf had lost his life sadly as the ship sank to the ocean as he returned to his hometown.
We did the opening of the statue in the birthplace of Big Yusuf in Şeytancık. http://twitpic.com/5pltzf
At the opening of the sculpture, we have had such a meeting since the Ottoman period, for the first time ... "http://twitpic.com/5plvzs
we experienced emotional moments.
The Tombul Mosque and Complex in Şumnu and the Nüvvab Mektebi next to it are among the most rare works surviving from the Ottoman era.
Throughout history, many important literati and clergymen have been brought up from the Kulliye and the Mektep. http://twitpic.com/5pm0u2
We will complete the remaining restoration of the mosque with the TİKA channel. http://twitpic.com/5pm2bl
Today, with the students of Nüvvab Mektebi who is operating as a Theology High School ... http://twitpic.com/5pm3gt
Osman Kılıç, one of our most valuable scholars who grew up in Şumnu Nüvvab Mektebi, was with us at the Bulgarian delegation.
Osman Kılıç, who returned to Shumuni, the city he grew up after 46 years, spent 17 years of his life in the Communist era.
The punishment of Kılıç, who received a death penalty for his accusation of "Turkish spy," was first converted to life, and then sent to Turkey with a 'spy suit'.
Kılıç'a, Nüvvab Mektebi'de, the mufti of Bulgaria was presented in peace. http://twitpic.com/5pm82z
I visited the Nazim Hikmet Culture House, which is named after Varna Önünden's poet Nazim, on a ferry, in Şumnu near Varna.
Bulgaria was the country where Nazim's first collection of Turkish poetry was published.
We listened to the program prepared for us at Nazım Hikmet Culture House http://twitpic.com/5pmb7y
The children who kept the tempo of "President Abi, President Abi" at the exit of Culture House went very happy. http://twitpic.com/5pmcfd
The last moment is from Sofia.
The Sofia metros are being built by the Turkish company Doğuş Group. I visited construction, I was in the reviews. I http://twitpic.com/5pm

I would like to inform the Azerbaijani public about the recent negotiations on the Armenia-Azerbaijan Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
Because negotiations have been going on for many years and we are at a crucial stage in the negotiations. #Azerbaijan
Firstly, I want to say that the last meeting of heads of the Minsk Group co-chair countries (cont) http://tl.gd/bnh47l
The second important point is that in the statement and subsequent statements it was stated that (cont) http://tl.gd/bnh9mb
This means that changing the status quo will definitely lead to the occupation of Azerbaijani lands.
The third important point is the activity of the Minsk Group co-chair countries in this regard.
We see that the co-chairing countries are now working very hard to find that the basic principles are soon to come (cont) http://tl.gd/bnhq0u
I have some realities about the last stages of the negotiations once again to the Azerbaijani public (cont) http://tl.gd/bnhskv
Since 2004, a negotiated format called the Prague process has emerged, and this process is going forward, though difficult. #Azerbaijan
@VGDakessian I do not have the answer but @JD_capital should.
As part of the Prague process, the Madrid principles were presented to the parties. #Azerbaijan
In early 2010, or rather, in January, Russian President Dmitry Medvedev visited Armenia and (cont) http://tl.gd/bnijcq
The Armenian side did not accept these principles, and after that, almost a certain stagnation appeared in the negotiations. #Azerbaijan
